search.query: eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.startedAs

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.name

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.descriptiveName

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.path="*ProgramData*" NOT ServiceItem.path="*ProgramData\\SystemStatus*" ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.path

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.path

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.arguments

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs=$startedas$ ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | rare limit=0 ServiceItem.description

eventtype=mir sourcetype=w32services $wild$ host=$host$ ServiceItem.status=$status$ ServiceItem.startedAs="*.adm*" ServiceItem.name=$name$ ServiceItem.descriptiveName=$descriptivename$ ServiceItem.path=$path$ ServiceItem.arguments=$arguments$ ServiceItem.description=$description$ | table host, ServiceItem.mode, ServiceItem.type, ServiceItem.status, ServiceItem{@created}, ServiceItem.startedAs, ServiceItem.name, ServiceItem.descriptiveName, ServiceItem.path, ServiceItem.arguments, ServiceItem.description | rename ServiceItem.description as Description
